name: Floral Shoppe
description:
Run a flower shop in this relaxing simulation game.  Manage orders, breed flowers, water flowers, and appease your boss!

Features;

- Three different types of flowers to learn

- (An admittedly unrealistic) genetics system with dominant and recessive traits, alleles, and various types of dominance

- Story mode where you fill orders and pay rent

- Free play mode where you can bred flowers at your own leisure
